title: Ep 54: Why Get Married?
description: In the era of Tinder and feminism, why bother getting married? It seems like such an antiquated idea, but why do people still do it? This episode explores marriage and debunks all the annoying things you've heard about it. I heard so many dumb things from dumb people about how marriage "really is". Well, here's what I think the truth is.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
